items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### e2e / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [lib-e2e-cypress-for-dummys (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/GonzaloCarmenado/lib-e2e-cypress-for-dummys) - An Angular library that automatically records the Cypress commands needed to test your application while you browse and use the interface. Ideal for developers who want to speed up E2E test creation without writing them manually.
items.content_html:
e2e / Google Developer Experts

  • lib-e2e-cypress-for-dummys (‚≠ê2) - An Angular library that automatically records the Cypress commands needed to test your application while you browse and use the interface. Ideal for developers who want to speed up E2E test creation without writing them manually.

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Plugins / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [sops-crypt (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/chaosimpact/sops-crypt) - Plugin for Mozilla SOPS that provides one-click encryption and decryption of files in the current directory and subdirectories.
items.content_html:
Plugins / superconsole - Windows-only

  • sops-crypt (‚≠ê1) - Plugin for Mozilla SOPS that provides one-click encryption and decryption of files in the current directory and subdirectories.

items.title: Free for Dev
items.content_text:
### APIs, Data, and ML

*   [YourGPT CSV to JSON](https://yourgpt.ai/tools/csv-to-json) ‚Äî A fast, free, and privacy-focused online tool to easily convert CSV files into structured JSON data right in your browser.

### Monitoring

*   [MonitorMonk](https://monitormonk.com) - Minimalist uptime monitoring with beautiful status pages. The Forever Free plan offers HTTPS, Keyword, SSL and Response-time monitorming for 10 websites or api-endpoints, and provides 2 dashboards/status pages.

### Managed Data Services

*   [Couchbase Capella](https://www.couchbase.com/products/capella/) - deploy a forever free tier fully managed database cluster built for developers to create the next generation of applications across IoT to AI
items.content_html:
APIs, Data, and ML

  • YourGPT CSV to JSON ‚Äî A fast, free, and privacy-focused online tool to easily convert CSV files into structured JSON data right in your browser.

Monitoring

  • MonitorMonk - Minimalist uptime monitoring with beautiful status pages. The Forever Free plan offers HTTPS, Keyword, SSL and Response-time monitorming for 10 websites or api-endpoints, and provides 2 dashboards/status pages.

Managed Data Services

  • Couchbase Capella - deploy a forever free tier fully managed database cluster built for developers to create the next generation of applications across IoT to AI

items.title: Awesome Postgres
items.content_text:
### Contents / Optimization

*   [pgassistant (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/nexsol-technologies/pgassistant) - A DB optimization dashboard for PostgreSQL with LLM and pgTune integration.
items.content_html:
Contents / Optimization

  • pgassistant (‚≠ê1.4k) - A DB optimization dashboard for PostgreSQL with LLM and pgTune integration.

items.title: Awesome Vue
items.content_text:
### Components & Libraries / Frameworks

*   [YummyAdmin (‚≠ê29)](https://github.com/doroudi/YummyAdmin) - üìà Free Vue Admin Panel based on Naive UI and TailwindCSS. fairly completed with beautiful design, RTL support, and multilingual. (MSW, Pinia, TS, UnoCss, Vite)

### Components & Libraries / UI Components

*   [vue-data-ui (‚≠ê1.8k)](https://github.com/graphieros/vue-data-ui) - Vue 3 chart library with 60+ components. Official site: <https://vue-data-ui.graphieros.com/>

### Components & Libraries / UI Utilities

*   [Enforma](https://encolajs.com/enforma/) - UI agnostic, schema-ready form library for Vue 3. 30+ built-in validation rules. UI presets for Vuetify, PrimeVue and Quasar
items.content_html:
Components & Libraries / Frameworks

  • YummyAdmin (‚≠ê29) - üìà Free Vue Admin Panel based on Naive UI and TailwindCSS. fairly completed with beautiful design, RTL support, and multilingual. (MSW, Pinia, TS, UnoCss, Vite)

Components & Libraries / UI Components

  • vue-data-ui (‚≠ê1.8k) - Vue 3 chart library with 60+ components. Official site: https://vue-data-ui.graphieros.com/

Components & Libraries / UI Utilities

  • Enforma - UI agnostic, schema-ready form library for Vue 3. 30+ built-in validation rules. UI presets for Vuetify, PrimeVue and Quasar
